recommendations: Not appearing for "pizza near me", "pizza", "best pizza Pittsburgh", "pizza delivery near me", "pizza Pittsburgh Pennsylvania", "top pizza Pittsburgh", "pizza restaurant near me", "pizza food Pittsburgh" - optimize Google My Business profile with these keywords

reviews.text: The Brooklyn Style XL Pizza is perfection. The crust is thin and crispy. The sauce is sweet, crushed tomatoes, with big pieces of basil. The cheese? NOT AT ALL GREASY. The Italian hoagie was clean, the meat AND LTO was so fresh. NOT GREASY. My husband said, ‚ÄúThey made it like they were gonna eat it themselves.‚Äù  The cannolis were perfect, crisp, little shells filled with a sweet ricotta cheese. I have FINALLY found my new pizza place in the north hills!

Was excited to try this place until I saw the diamond pattern on the bottom of the pizza.  That either tells me it was cooked in a conveyor oven or for some reason they are cooking them on pizza trays then finishing on the deck of the oven.  Definitely not Brooklyn style.

Decent somewhat new spot for pizza. Their style is very typical of Pittsburgh I would say. Pretty doughy, on the thicker side for crust. But, it‚Äôs still an enjoyable pie. I got to try out their plain cheese pizza.

It was solid. Nothing too exceptional really but not bad. The sauce is a little sweet but not excessively so. As I mentioned, it is doughy, but I think their dough quality is a little above the average in the area. Their portion sizes are pretty great and the food is super reasonably priced. This would be a great pizza for game day or a relaxed weekend.

All in all, nice spot for pie. They also have some more interesting pizza styles, like Mediterranean and such. I would go back to try those, but even with the basics, prices and portions are good.

This place happens to be close to where we live -- but we are very happy about that.  The food is worth going much farther out of our way for.  The pizza is consistently delicious, with the crust being not too chewy and not too crisp -- it's actually just right!  We've tried several different topping combinations, and they always seem to do them with care.  Mushrooms and onions are fresh -- which is a big deal since many other places cut corners on freshness.  They have some interesting -- and good -- gourmet topping combinations as well.  We also like the gyros.  They are always friendly and have come to recognize me.  Parking is also very convenient since it sits right next to the old Port Authority Millvale "bus loop" which is now a parking lot.  This has become a regular, go to place for us, which is very nice.

I got their menu in my mailbox weeks ago and finally tried it, wished I tried it sooner. Food was delicious, I had 1/2 dozen boneless wings and a gyro, both were excellent. Delivery was pretty quick and order was correct. Can't wait to try more of their menu!

recentReviews.text: Always fresh hot great food with customer service like no other. I would recommend Fornello pizza for anyone. Absolutely fantastic pizza.

I got their menu in my mailbox weeks ago and finally tried it, wished I tried it sooner. Food was delicious, I had 1/2 dozen boneless wings and a gyro, both were excellent. Delivery was pretty quick and order was correct. Can't wait to try more of their menu!

I bought a meat lovers pizza and it was loaded with meat toppings and the crust was delicious. I could see the pizza chef making the pizza from fresh dough while I was checking out. I will make this my place for pizza in the future. Monte Cello raised their prices and skimped on toppings, they were my last goto for pizza!

My wife and I were there today for the 1st time. While we were waiting for our steak hoagie and fries we were each offered a piece of pizza. Everything was awesome great service and staff we will definitely be going back. Thank you.
plenty pizza places by me but this is my go to üî•üî•

Was excited to try this place until I saw the diamond pattern on the bottom of the pizza.  That either tells me it was cooked in a conveyor oven or for some reason they are cooking them on pizza trays then finishing on the deck of the oven.  Definitely not Brooklyn style.

This place happens to be close to where we live -- but we are very happy about that.  The food is worth going much farther out of our way for.  The pizza is consistently delicious, with the crust being not too chewy and not too crisp -- it's actually just right!  We've tried several different topping combinations, and they always seem to do them with care.  Mushrooms and onions are fresh -- which is a big deal since many other places cut corners on freshness.  They have some interesting -- and good -- gourmet topping combinations as well.  We also like the gyros.  They are always friendly and have come to recognize me.  Parking is also very convenient since it sits right next to the old Port Authority Millvale "bus loop" which is now a parking lot.  This has become a regular, go to place for us, which is very nice.

detailedReviews.text: Always fresh hot great food with customer service like no other. I would recommend Fornello pizza for anyone. Absolutely fantastic pizza.

detailedReviews.text: Food is delicious

detailedReviews.author: Brian Zaborowski
detailedReviews.text: I got their menu in my mailbox weeks ago and finally tried it, wished I tried it sooner. Food was delicious, I had 1/2 dozen boneless wings and a gyro, both were excellent. Delivery was pretty quick and order was correct. Can't wait to try more of their menu!

detailedReviews.author: KubotaManDan
detailedReviews.text: I bought a meat lovers pizza and it was loaded with meat toppings and the crust was delicious. I could see the pizza chef making the pizza from fresh dough while I was checking out. I will make this my place for pizza in the future. Monte Cello raised their prices and skimped on toppings, they were my last goto for pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Harry Igims
detailedReviews.text: My wife and I were there today for the 1st time. While we were waiting for our steak hoagie and fries we were each offered a piece of pizza. Everything was awesome great service and staff we will definitely be going back. Thank you.

detailedReviews.author: montae S.
detailedReviews.text: plenty pizza places by me but this is my go to üî•üî•

detailedReviews.author: Zach Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Was excited to try this place until I saw the diamond pattern on the bottom of the pizza.  That either tells me it was cooked in a conveyor oven or for some reason they are cooking them on pizza trays then finishing on the deck of the oven.  Definitely not Brooklyn style.

detailedReviews.text: This place happens to be close to where we live -- but we are very happy about that.  The food is worth going much farther out of our way for.  The pizza is consistently delicious, with the crust being not too chewy and not too crisp -- it's actually just right!  We've tried several different topping combinations, and they always seem to do them with care. detailedReviews.author: Paul Golacinski
detailedReviews.text: This is my new favorite pizza place. Tried just about everything on the menu and it's all good. Good value too. Side salad I got with the pasta dish had more veggies then most sit down restaurants. Highly recommend the meatball hogie

detailedReviews.author: Bj Porter
detailedReviews.text: First time ordering due to a mailing we got. I‚Äôm glad it came and a glad we gave them a try!! We ordered pizza and hoagie combo.. (fish hoagie,pep pizza) , the food was still hot and the delivery driver was courteous !!! Will definitely order again I‚Äôm so mad we are about to move and I know they aren‚Äôt going to deliver to usüò™

detailedReviews.author: Greg Taylor
detailedReviews.text: The sauce was good, the spinach so fresh. I really annoyed it, and when I‚Äôm the area, would def get again.

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Binkowski
detailedReviews.text: Ordered 3 pies for my family on a Sunday night. Ate at a table. Great prices and pizza was delicious. Kids loved the traditional and my wife and I ordered the steel city Sicilian (fantastic). Owner was incredible and I am grateful to find our families new pizza joint

detailedReviews.author: Sharon Mulder
detailedReviews.text: We received  a menu in the mail. After several failed orders with chain shops, we decided to try this. Wow, it is so good. We ordered a large supreme and it is a large. Italian hoagie and fish hoagie was also ordered. Both tasted amazing, husband said fish was best he ever had. Glad we found a new shop to oder from. The delivery was right on time and hot. Thank you for mailing your menu.

detailedReviews.author: marlene azen
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a meat lovers pizza not very good. I'VE had better frozen pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Alex Palmer
detailedReviews.text: Great food at reasonable prices and fantastic service. Staff is always pleasant and friendly. My husband and I eat here at least once a week between the two of us, very easy location and tons of parking!

detailedReviews.author: Dillon Kuhns
detailedReviews.text: Best food around

detailedReviews.author: Douglas Rabuzzi
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza! Will definitely order from Fornello again.

detailedReviews.author: Linda Hartsell
detailedReviews.text: Got my menu in the mail gave them a try, food was great, delivery fast , nice delivery driver. Will order from  there again.

detailedReviews.author: TheJdizzle227
detailedReviews.text: I got a flyer of theirs in the mail and decided to try out their seafood pizza, and my god is it good! Their pizza is worth every penny, i‚Äôll be a customer as long as they‚Äôre around

detailedReviews.author: Ernie Abeyta
detailedReviews.text: Awesome food!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Platek
detailedReviews.text: Tremendous

detailedReviews.author: Rohit Phatak
detailedReviews.text: Ordered this pizza for my son‚Äôs birthday party at the business next door. Excellent customer service and good pies also. The buffalo chicken was really good as was the Brooklyn pie.

detailedReviews.author: Glenn Eggert
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was wonderful and so was the zucchini. I will gladly go back. Also, say HI to Omar!

detailedReviews.author: Wanda Krause
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is always hot and they have kind employees.

detailedReviews.author: Eric Ludwig
detailedReviews.text: We've ordered a few times and think the food is great overall. We did order delivery and got a call to make sure we were tipping before they delivered. We ordered some extra ranch dips, but did not receive them and paid a dollar each. Not a lot of money but would expect accurate delivery after reaching out to us

detailedReviews.author: Ines Brady
detailedReviews.text: The Brooklyn Style XL Pizza is perfection. The crust is thin and crispy. The sauce is sweet, crushed tomatoes, with big pieces of basil. The cheese? NOT AT ALL GREASY. The Italian hoagie was clean, the meat AND LTO was so fresh. NOT GREASY. My husband said, ‚ÄúThey made it like they were gonna eat it themselves.‚Äù  The cannolis were perfect, crisp, little shells filled with a sweet ricotta cheese. I have FINALLY found my new pizza place in the north hills!

detailedReviews.author: Kim R
detailedReviews.text: This is our favorite pizza spot. Excellent service, delicious food, and affordable prices!

detailedReviews.author: Natasha Herald
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza! Awesome wings as well. Service here was wonderful

detailedReviews.author: Nick
detailedReviews.text: Average in every way

detailedReviews.author: Steven Justus
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best pizza in the Burgh. Always have the best experience with their food and their staff. Can't recommend enough.

detailedReviews.author: Sherrie Dell
detailedReviews.text: Very good pizza!!! Nice place to sit & dine in. Staff is friendly & professional. Will be trying more of the menu.

detailedReviews.author: Don Cunningham
detailedReviews.text: Been ordering here fairly regularly and have never had a bad experience - always ready for pickup when I arrive, always quality pizza. Best value pizza shop in the area, in my opinion.

detailedReviews.author: Bill Hurst
detailedReviews.text: Great stop in Millville..Pizza by the slice.

detailedReviews.author: Gerry Leghart
detailedReviews.text: I enjoyed my food. 2 slices of pepperoni pizza and ¬Ω an Italian hoagie (all of it was delicious). Very friendly server. The atmosphere was great, but it is a pizza joint not a 5 star restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: john kenny
detailedReviews.text: It's different but in a good way and from what I seen very clean

detailedReviews.author: Jaclyn OShea
detailedReviews.text:
I got a fornello flyer in my mailbox yesterday and decided to give them a shot. I'm glad I did. They have great portions and the variety of pizza is amazing.  I got delivery from the restaurant instead of a delivery app. The gentleman who delivered was really nice and easy to talk to.
10/10 I'd recommend and order again

detailedReviews.author: John.Leigh McBurney
detailedReviews.text:
We ordered a pizza tonight, and the delivery driver was completely rude and ignorant. He kept complaining that the restaurant had closed.

They tried to pass off a 4 cut pizza they cut into an 8 cut to pass it off what we actually ordered.

We will never order from this dump again...

We have ordered from this place numerous times in the past, but Never again !! Total crap service.. and we tipped the ignorant driver, after all that.

detailedReviews.author: Baraa 25
detailedReviews.text: This place is honestly one of my favourite‚Äôs. The pizza is always hot and cheesy ,you can tell they use quality. The hoagies are loaded too. The shop is clean, the vibe is chill, and the staff are always friendly and quick.

detailedReviews.author: Larr Sta
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was average nothing special not bad but not great need more Italian quilty and taste

detailedReviews.author: Adam Fincik
detailedReviews.text: Top 10 for sure in Pittsburgh

detailedReviews.author: Leah Nowicki
detailedReviews.text: Amazing! A delicious pizza has the perfect combination of quality products, the correct dough/sauce/cheese/topping ratio, and baked correctly. Fornello Pizzeria has all this, and everyone working there is  so welcoming and has excellent customer service. Super clean kitchen, dinning room, and bathrooms. Their menu is vast, offerings a wide variety of options, including gluten free pizza. The quality you get is such a great value!! I love this place and will be returning soon!! Te≈üekk√ºrler!

detailedReviews.author: Alison Armstrong
detailedReviews.text: Excellent service and pizza

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Baker
detailedReviews.text: I am going to give more than one star because the service was great.  Everyone was very friendly.  I got the lunch special, 1/2 hoagie, fries and drink.  I started off with the fries and they were really good.  I am sorry to say though the chicken parm hoagie was the worst chicken parm hoagie I have ever had and I feel like I wasted my money.  A quarter of the way through I opened the bread and the breading on the chicken was almost white and when I tried a piece of it by itself it tasted awful so that's what made it taste bad, not the sauce.  I recommend you change your chicken.  I think I would still give this establishment another try.

detailedReviews.author: Abdullah Hwarat
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza spot

detailedReviews.author: amanda burk
detailedReviews.text: Very kind and helpful! Made sure I was able to order a dairy free vegetable hoagie.

detailedReviews.author: Sean Cunningham
detailedReviews.text: Stopped here after a long day and it hit the spot perfectly. The staff was extremely friendly and the food was very good. We got the ranchero pizza and a dozen of their ‚Äúhot‚Äù flavor wings. They were not Buffalo style but had great flavor. Will definitely be back

detailedReviews.author: Mike Wagner
detailedReviews.text: Right up there with the best pizzas in the burgh and we are pizza snobs , great job

detailedReviews.author: M G
detailedReviews.text: This place is a gem! The service is friendly and fast, the shop is super clean, and the food is absolutely excellent. The pizza quality is way beyond your average pizza shop‚Äîfresh ingredients, perfect crust, and great flavor. Best of all, prices are very reasonable for what you get. Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Natalie Rose
detailedReviews.text: We love Fornello pizza. Their pizza is fantastic and they‚Äôre very friendly! Highly recommended!

detailedReviews.author: Dale Mangold
detailedReviews.text: We ordered a Brooklyn style pizza and it was AMAZING! Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Katie Wolf
detailedReviews.text: Any night we don‚Äôt feel like cooking we order from here. Pizza and hoagies are the go to. Great food, friendly staff. Love it!

detailedReviews.author: Cheri Snyder
detailedReviews.text: Their food is phenomenal!! I‚Äôve never been to the restaurant but the delivery is always on point. I would recommend this place for the outstanding steak salads and pastas and wings!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Willett
detailedReviews.text: This place is fire!

detailedReviews.author: Jill Squire
detailedReviews.text:
We have placed three phone orders to request changes or exceptions from the on-line menu related to allergies or taste preferences over the past two months with Fornello‚Äôs and have been so very pleased with how kind, attentive, and accommodating they have been. The food has invariably been delicious and excellent! Our most recent order was a larger friends & family order and everyone raved at how good the food was!

My husband loves Fornello‚Äôs Gyros. He is picky about his Gyro :)

Highly recommended for quality, deliciousness, level of service, and just being really nice people to give our business to!

detailedReviews.author: Tali Tali
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza, cleanest pizzeria, great atmosphere, and absolutely amazing staff üòÄ Thank you so much. The food is absolutely delicious

detailedReviews.author: Mike Erdeljac
detailedReviews.text: Great food, quick delivery service! Omar was very prompt and friendly while delivering our order. Will definitely be ordering from them again!

detailedReviews.author: Brian Condle
detailedReviews.text: First time here and the pizza was fantastic

detailedReviews.author: Joe Kress
detailedReviews.text:
Great food, excellent Price. And the best service. Hoagie was great. Wings were great
Pizza was great.

detailedReviews.author: Ulyana K
detailedReviews.text:
Decent somewhat new spot for pizza. Their style is very typical of Pittsburgh I would say. Pretty doughy, on the thicker side for crust. But, it‚Äôs still an enjoyable pie. I got to try out their plain cheese pizza.

It was solid. Nothing too exceptional really but not bad. The sauce is a little sweet but not excessively so. As I mentioned, it is doughy, but I think their dough quality is a little above the average in the area. Their portion sizes are pretty great and the food is super reasonably priced. This would be a great pizza for game day or a relaxed weekend.

All in all, nice spot for pie. They also have some more interesting pizza styles, like Mediterranean and such. I would go back to try those, but even with the basics, prices and portions are good.

detailedReviews.author: Ammar Zafar
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza and friendly staff!! Get the buffalo chicken pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Keith Kendra
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Kate Kostilnik
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve only ordered once, but we are definitely ordering again. The meat lovers pizza was delicious - not too saucy, the meat was crispy, and their dough was fantastic- some of the best crust I‚Äôve had in the city. We didn‚Äôt get any marinara sauce with our mozzarella sticks, but the pizza 100% made up for any irritation that caused.

detailedReviews.author: MEHMET EMƒ∞N AK√áA
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza Shop in the town. Must try folks

detailedReviews.author: Jeanine P
detailedReviews.text:
Ordered for the first time today. Got a chx ranch hoagie and a Pepperoni pizza. It was all delicious, and very hot when it arrived. The marinated chicken was great quality chicken, and the sauce on the pizza was very well seasoned!

The staff was also wonderful. Very kind and you can tell they really care about their business and what I thought of the food/service.

We will definitely be ordering again. A+

detailedReviews.author: Brooklyn Meyer
detailedReviews.text: Just moved into the area decided to try this pizza out with my kiddos. The Italian hoagie is the best I‚Äôve ever had, the pizza is phenomenal. The crust is the best part. I will definitely be ordering from here in the future! üòäüòä

detailedReviews.author: Steve Cahup
detailedReviews.text:
First time trying the Sicilian Pizza.
Couldn't look at it when we picked it up the box was tapped.
When we got home there was hardly any cheese  and it was burnt.
Called back to let the owner know, he said that's how they make it. I wasn't  looking for a refund,  just wanted him to know....He doesn't know how to back his business up.
I would have made the customer happy...instead he lost a customer.

detailedReviews.author: Buz Armitage
detailedReviews.text: Delicious steak hoagies with plenty of meat! Good eating!

detailedReviews.author: Justin P
detailedReviews.text: amazing pizza. The people are very nice and the pizza was very fast. They gave me a free pizza as a promotion for signing up with them. It was really good. thank u staff!

detailedReviews.author: andrea wittman
detailedReviews.text: So excited to finally have a good, fresh, local spot!

detailedReviews.author: A L
detailedReviews.text: Had for the first time this past weekend and it was honestly the best cheese pizza I‚Äôve had in a while. Also ordered the fried mushrooms and jalape√±o poppers and they were delicious. Great prices too

detailedReviews.author: Shiah Hammer
detailedReviews.text: I literally just received my order and dug into my calzone. Best thing I've eaten in a very long time!!!

detailedReviews.author: Cindy Ruhl
detailedReviews.text: Food always hot and people really nice

detailedReviews.author: Monica Aveni-Ranii
detailedReviews.text: From the friendly staff the Cleanliness of the store to the unbelievable food that taste like heaven, all I can tell you that this place is the best in Pittsburgh, a gem in this town. The Italian food pizza cinnamon sticks garlic bread was light as a feather and the owners are not Italians but Turkish, Mama Mia!

detailedReviews.author: William Stone Rupard
detailedReviews.text: Awesomeness so so good  highly Recommend üëè

detailedReviews.author: Mandee Rupard
detailedReviews.text: Awesomeness so so good highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Kathleen Ebitz
detailedReviews.text: We ordered the coupon deal (2 large pizzas for $29.99) for our Neighborhood game night. Delivery was prompt, delivery driver was very nice, and the pizza was very good! Will definitely order again!

detailedReviews.author: Emilee White
detailedReviews.text: The food is always so fresh and good, everyone is so kind and professional. They have a great sense of humor and they‚Äôre very fast with the food prep and delivery. Highly recommend this place out of everyone else near by! Especially with the prices being so great

detailedReviews.author: Lee Ann Muse
detailedReviews.text: Ordered not realizing they were in Milvale, but they were nice enough to bring it to me anyway. Pizza and breadsticks were awesome,  would order from them again definitely!!

detailedReviews.author: Taunya Tivo
detailedReviews.text:
Ranchero Steak Hoagie...So So So So Delish!
I cant wait to go again and get another!!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Kiley
detailedReviews.text: Really good pizza

detailedReviews.author: Larry R
detailedReviews.text:
All of the workers that I‚Äôve interacted with during my 10 or more visits to the shop were are exceptionally friendly and helpful.  This last visit, I was interacting with Omar, who was extremely personable and didn‚Äôt mind making my Pizza just the way we like it, in our house.  The $14.99
Large 1 topping pizza can feed 3 people (currently it is very hard to feed 3 people for just $15). with average appetites, and so my wife and I, always have some pizza left over.  We‚Äôve their Red Sauce pizzas, several times, but our favorite is the White Pizza with Sliced Tomatoes as the topping.  The perfect amount of garlic to make for a perfect pizza.  The dough is fresh, and so the crust is so good, that it all gets eaten.   Very pleased to be a Fornello Pizzeria customer.

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Madigan
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the area. Also, excellent breadsticks, chicken tenders, and wings. Very friendly people whether you pick up or have delivered. Highly recommended place on all levels.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the consistently delicious pizza with a perfect crust and fresh toppings, which sets it apart from other places that cut corners on freshness. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The friendly and attentive customer service, including gestures like offering a piece of pizza while waiting, creates a welcoming atmosphere that encourages repeat visits. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The convenient location with ample parking makes it easy for customers to visit frequently, contributing to its status as a regular go-to place. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues, particularly regarding service and product quality (e.g., rude delivery driver, incorrect orders, poor food quality) - review management can address this concern
Poor online visibility and competition/discovery issues (e.g., customers not recognizing the unique style or quality of the pizza) - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness (e.g., customers not recognizing the restaurant's unique style or ambiance) - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: SCOTT Wellington
positive.text: Always fresh hot great food with customer service like no other. I would recommend Fornello pizza for anyone. Absolutely fantastic pizza.

neutral.author: Stephanie Baker
neutral.text: I am going to give more than one star because the service was great.  Everyone was very friendly.  I got the lunch special, 1/2 hoagie, fries and drink.  I started off with the fries and they were really good.  I am sorry to say though the chicken parm hoagie was the worst chicken parm hoagie I have ever had and I feel like I wasted my money.  A quarter of the way through I opened the bread and the breading on the chicken was almost white and when I tried a piece of it by itself it tasted awful so that's what made it taste bad, not the sauce.  I recommend you change your chicken.  I think I would still give this establishment another try.

neutral.author: Ulyana K
neutral.text:
Decent somewhat new spot for pizza. Their style is very typical of Pittsburgh I would say. Pretty doughy, on the thicker side for crust. But, it‚Äôs still an enjoyable pie. I got to try out their plain cheese pizza.

It was solid. Nothing too exceptional really but not bad. The sauce is a little sweet but not excessively so. As I mentioned, it is doughy, but I think their dough quality is a little above the average in the area. Their portion sizes are pretty great and the food is super reasonably priced. This would be a great pizza for game day or a relaxed weekend.

All in all, nice spot for pie. They also have some more interesting pizza styles, like Mediterranean and such. I would go back to try those, but even with the basics, prices and portions are good.

negative.author: Zach Johnson
negative.text: Was excited to try this place until I saw the diamond pattern on the bottom of the pizza.  That either tells me it was cooked in a conveyor oven or for some reason they are cooking them on pizza trays then finishing on the deck of the oven.  Definitely not Brooklyn style.

negative.author: marlene azen
negative.text: Ordered a meat lovers pizza not very good. I'VE had better frozen pizza!

negative.author: John.Leigh McBurney
negative.text:
We ordered a pizza tonight, and the delivery driver was completely rude and ignorant. He kept complaining that the restaurant had closed.

They tried to pass off a 4 cut pizza they cut into an 8 cut to pass it off what we actually ordered.

We will never order from this dump again...

We have ordered from this place numerous times in the past, but Never again !! Total crap service.. and we tipped the ignorant driver, after all that.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
